name: Fragments (of the stars)
description:
A short story / game about a robot putting her face back together.

Fragments was made in HyperCard for the Merveilles Hyperjam. You can run it using either HyperCard proper or the HyperCard viewer in Mini vMac.

Playing the game without an emulator

At the moment, you can't. However, after the jam, I might make either a video or a web-based version using the assets I produced. This story is relevant to other games and stories that I'm developing, so Fragments is likely to make an appearance in non-HyperCard format sooner or later.
